Class RegistrationForm

java.lang.Object
view.form.RegistrationForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFormView, IView
public class RegistrationForm extends Object implements IFormView
A form view that handles the process of registering a new user. This class implements IFormView and interacts with RegistrationController to validate and register the user.

  • Method Details

    • prompt

      public void prompt()
      This method prompts the user to input their details for registration. It validates the inputs and interacts with RegistrationController to register the user.
      Specified by:
      prompt in interface IFormView

    • getUserInput

      public HashMap<String,Object> getUserInput()
      Retrieves the user input map containing details for registration.
      Specified by:
      getUserInput in interface IFormView
      Returns:
      userInput which is a HashMap with keys "name", "nric", "password", "age", and "maritalStatus" representing the user's inputs.
